field.description:
Enable this access list.
Rules are processed in order, from top to bottom.
Select action to take on this rule
Specify a description for this rule.

Specify local id for this rule
Local IDs can either be complete, such as user@company.com, partial like company.com or all to match any id.

Specify the list of remote ids(one per line) that localid can chat with.
Remote IDs can be complete ids like user@company.com, partial company.com, all to match any id or groupchat.
